Blacksmith of Mammon:
Here, I'll give you a Lady's Ornamental Silver Knife. Use the Scroll: Enchant Weapon (R-grade) to enchant it.
I'll give you a certificate if you can enchant it up to +7.
Just letting you know, the Lady's Ornamental Silver Knife has no value. I just want to test your perseverance and luck.
If you ever lose it, I can provide you with another Lady's Ornamental Silver Knife.
